title: Riot seems to have an addiction to true damage lately.
body:
First they made Sated Devourer, which happens to help the true damage of {{champion:2}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:67}} . 

And then they reworked {{champion:114}}  to have a max% HP true damage passive that scales with AD. 

And while they were at it they reworked the passive of {{champion:41}} so that it now also deals very heavy true damage that scales with AD.

And now they are reworking {{champion:122}} and making it so that he can make better use of his true damage ult.

And they are also reworking {{champion:86}} and giving him the option to deal true damage with his ult in the event that he uses it on the last enemy champion to kill a team mate.
